tag_list: datacraft-solutions, lean-manufacturing, signum, curator, kanban, jit
overview:
Matthew Marotta’s management and technology background spans over 15 years. He has been a founder / co-founder of four companies. The success of his last company, Datacraft Solutions, Inc., allowed him to be recognized as one of the foremost thought leaders in the lean manufacturing market.

His career began as a project manager and senior consultant for IBM, and then spanned across multiple industries as a senior consultant assigned to several projects in the New York/New Jersey market. One of his projects required him to develop / design an intricate information-sharing network for a high profile investment company (ADP).
